is a town in the state of

Formerly Port of Leopoldina, it was founded in 1850 and until 1958 was the main port of supply for the City of Goiás, the state capital at the time. It was renamed the Aruanã because of the strong presence of a fish that has the same name, that also means a Karaja tribe dance; the Karajas have a very old village just beside the banks of the Araguaia.

The tourism at Aruana not only consists of scenic beauties, but the set of attractions, infrastructure, services and visitors. There's also the diversity of the fish fauna, that makes Araguaia River and other rivers belonging to the Amazon Basin ideal for the practice of fishing and ecotourism, segments that are growing significantly throughout Brazil.
The city has its own airport.
The city is served by highways GO-530, GO-070 and GO-060.

content=Tributary of the right bank of the Araguaia River (180 km long), born in the Golden Sierra, 17 km from the city of Goiás, flowing into the Araguaia at Aruana.

enjoy the Araguaia River, abundant fishing and leisure in its beautiful beaches that attract hundreds of tourists in time of season (July to September). The main scaly species are pacu caranha, matrinxã, pirarucu, piau, pacu, sardinha, corvina and traíra. Among the leathery fish are filhote, cachara, barbado, pirarara, jaú, mandubé, surubim chicote, bico de pato (duckbill) and mandi.
August-Feasts of the Holy Spirit, St. Sebastian and Our Lady of the Rosary
September-Cowboy Festival of Aranuã / 07 - Feast of Our Lady of the Rosary
Local crafts - much influenced by Karajá culture, amazing variety in the use of raw materials (wood, coconut, straw, clay, etc.)., Weaving and flower arrangements.

For camping, the environmental agencies require the campers compliance with the rules of coexistence with the Rio Araguaia. Some of them: do not use wood native to the region, no hunting, no fishing without license from environmental agencies, no fireworks, dig your toilet at least 30 meters away from the riverbank, do not using cans inside, and take all the trash produced the camp back to the city.
